member.name: T:Sudoku.Bot.Console.CommandLines.ArgChecker
member.summary: Encapsulates a command line arguments checker.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Bot.Console.CommandLines.ArgChecker.IsConfigMode(System.String[])
member.summary: Check whether the arguments contains the config mode symbol /config.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Bot.Console.CommandLines.ArgChecker.EnableGreeting(System.String[])
member.summary: Indicates whether the bot says hello to the groups when the bot is initialized.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Bot.Console.CommandLines.ArgChecker.TryGetPath(System.String[],System.String@)
member.summary: Try to get the path from the arguments.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Bot.Console.CommandLines.ArgChecker.TryGetSize(System.String[],System.Int32@)
member.summary: Try to get the size value from the arguments.
member.param: The result size. If failed to get, the value is always 800.
